page.prototype: $u.n.round(value as number, decimalPlace as number, dir as string)
page.description: Round a number to a specified number of decimal places.
page.discussion: Takes a number as input and rounds it to the specified number of decimal places. Returns a number.

argument.name: decimalPlace
argument.description: The number of decimal places to keep in the rounded number.

argument.name: dir
argument.description: (Optional) Allows you to specify the direction you want to round. *[js:dir]* can have one of three possible values:

item.name: normal
item.description: Default behavior. If the value of the digit after the rounding decimal point is less then 5 round down, otherwise round up.
